title: MYX Fitness President on State of At-Home Wellness
itunes:title: MYX Fitness President on State of At-Home Wellness
description:
Herbie Calves, President at MYX Fitness, discusses the state of at-home wellness during the coronavirus outbreak. He says gym brands are scrambling to find ways to help people stay fit in their homes.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
